<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 7"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Powered Full Plate](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1982)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=6" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 64 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 360 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn armor

**Bulk** 4
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Stasian actuators help the limbs of this [full plate](/Armor.aspx?ID=50) move of their own accord, as long as they’re supplied with power. A chamber in the chest plate can hold a single [bottled lightning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3290), which takes 3 Interact actions to install.

**Activate** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645))   **Requirements** A bottled lightning is installed in the shield; **Effect** The armor powers up for 10 minutes. While it’s powered up, add the bottled lightning’s item bonus to your [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) checks to [Force Open](/Actions.aspx?ID=2375), [High Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2377), [Long Jump](/Actions.aspx?ID=2378), and [Shove](/Actions.aspx?ID=2380). The armor’s Strength requirement is lowered by 1, or by 2 if the loaded bottled lightning’s item bonus to attack rolls is +3 or higher. The armor’s normal penalties still apply, based on this altered Strength. The activation uses up the bottled lightning, and the armor can’t be activated again until a new one is installed.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Powered Full Plate
